2ï¸âƒ£ The setup on $AMZE:

â€¢ ATM filed: 2025-11-13

â€¢ Cash: ~$300K

â€¢ Debt: ~$8.1M
High price after a run + emergency cash need + active ATM = classic dilution setup risk.

3ï¸âƒ£ What confirms trouble:
â€¢ Heavy red candle with big volume after any bounce
â€¢ Selling pressure expanding intraday

â€¢ Already 45% off the highs with critical distress level

4ï¸âƒ£ Scenarios on $AMZE:
